org.apache.taverna.reference.impl

Class AbstractErrorDocumentServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.reference.impl.AbstractServiceImpl
      • org.apache.taverna.reference.impl.AbstractErrorDocumentServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorDocumentService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ErrorDocumentServiceImpl

    public abstract class AbstractErrorDocumentServiceImpl
extends AbstractServiceImpl
implements ErrorDocumentService
    Abstract implementation of ErrorDocumentService, inject with an appropriate ErrorDocumentDao and T2ReferenceGenerator to enable. Contains injectors for id generation and dao along with other bookkeeping, leaving the implementation of the actual service logic to the subclass.
    Author:
    Tom Oinn

      • getErrorAsynch

        public final void getErrorAsynch(T2Reference id,
                                 ErrorDocumentServiceCallback callback)
                          throws ErrorDocumentServiceException
        Description copied from interface: ErrorDocumentService
        Functionality the same as getError but in asynchronous mode, returning immediately and using the supplied callback to communicate its results.
        Specified by:
        getErrorAsynch in interface ErrorDocumentService
        Parameters:
        id - a T2Reference identifying an ErrorDocument to retrieve
        callback - a ErrorDocumentServiceCallback used to convey the results of the asynchronous call
        Throws:
        ErrorDocumentServiceException - if the reference set service is not correctly configured. Exceptions encountered when performing the asynchronous call are not returned here, for obvious reasons, and are instead messaged through the callback interface.
